title: Military Simulations and Metaverses
itunes:title: Military Simulations and Metaverses
description:
Pete Morrison from Bohemia Interactive Simulations joins the show to talk about what goes into creating simulated worlds for military training and how that work could be part of the foundation for the metaverse.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

itunes:keywords: Pete Morrison, Bohemia Interactive Simulations, military, training, VR, virtual reality, AR, augmented reality, metaverse, Meta, Microsoft, Web 3.0, blockchain, NFT
